about_smg.label: COMPANY_INFO
responses:
SMG Electric Scooters is a flagship company of the Saurav Mittal Group, founded in 2020 and headquartered in New Delhi.
The Saurav Mittal Group itself was established in 2003 and has grown into a diversified business group.

Here‚Äôs a quick overview of SMG Electric Scooters:
‚Ä¢ Flagship company of Saurav Mittal Group (group founded in 2003)
‚Ä¢ SMG Electric Scooters founded in 2020, HQ in New Delhi
‚Ä¢ Manufacturing plant in Hoshiarpur, Punjab with 1 lakh units/year capacity
‚Ä¢ 1,500+ permanent employees across locations.

SMG Electric Scooters manufactures electric two‚Äëwheelers from its Hoshiarpur, Punjab facility (capacity of 1 lakh units per year) and operates PAN India with exports to 25+ countries in East Africa, Middle East Asia and other regions, with expansion plans towards Europe and America.

internships.label: INTERNSHIP_QUERY
responses:
SMG Nirmaan is a 30‚Äëday Summer & Winter internship programme for 2nd, 3rd and 4th year engineering students.

Available roles:
‚Ä¢ Software Design Engineer Intern
‚Ä¢ EV Component Designer Intern

Modes:
‚Ä¢ Onsite
‚Ä¢ Hybrid
‚Ä¢ Online

Onsite working hours: 4 hours (9:00‚Äì1:00 or 1:00‚Äì5:00)
Online working hours: 4 hours (flexible slots)

Perks:
‚Ä¢ Letter of Recommendation
‚Ä¢ Mentorship from industry experts
‚Ä¢ Events and expo exposure
‚Ä¢ Strong industry exposure in green mobility.

The SMG Nirmaan Internship Programme is a focused 30‚Äëday learning experience for engineering students in their 2nd‚Äì4th year, offered in both Summer and Winter batches, with flexible modes (onsite, hybrid, online) and dedicated roles in software design and EV component design.

Under SMG Nirmaan, interns get structured 30‚Äëday exposure in EV technology, software design and component design, along with mentorship, events, expo participation and a formal Letter of Recommendation from SMG.

scholarships.label: SCHOLARSHIP_QUERY
responses:
SMG offers scholarships for students from Tier 2 & Tier 3 cities whose family income is below ‚Çπ3 lakhs per annum.
Eligible courses include MBA, B.Tech and M.Tech, and the scholarship amount can go up to ‚Çπ2.5 lakhs.

Our scholarship programme supports deserving students from Tier‚Äë2 and Tier‚Äë3 cities with family income below ‚Çπ3 lakhs per year, primarily for MBA, B.Tech and M.Tech, with awards that may go up to ‚Çπ2.5 lakhs based on profile.

If you are from a Tier‚Äë2 or Tier‚Äë3 city with a family income under ‚Çπ3 lakhs per year and pursuing MBA, B.Tech or M.Tech, you may be eligible for SMG Scholarships of up to ‚Çπ2.5 lakhs, subject to our internal selection process.

industrial_visit.label: INDUSTRIAL_VISIT_QUERY
responses:
SMG Bhraman is our industrial visit programme where students can experience real corporate operations at SMG‚Äôs manufacturing plant.
Visits are typically scheduled during April‚ÄìMay and October‚ÄìNovember.

Under SMG Bhraman, student groups and institutions can visit our Hoshiarpur manufacturing facility to see actual EV manufacturing, operations and processes, usually in the April‚ÄìMay and October‚ÄìNovember windows.

If your college is interested in industrial visits, SMG Bhraman offers guided plant visits (mainly in April‚ÄìMay and October‚ÄìNovember) to give students first‚Äëhand exposure to corporate and manufacturing environments.

financing_insurance.label: FINANCE_QUERY
responses:
On the financing side, SMG works with 10+ finance partners and offers up to 90% financing with interest rates starting around 8.5%, minimal paperwork and hassle‚Äëfree approvals.

For insurance, plans start from around ‚Çπ2,499 with 15+ insurance partners and quick approval processes.

We support buyers with flexible finance options (often up to 90% of the vehicle value, with competitive interest rates and simple documentation) and insurance starting near ‚Çπ2,499, through a wide partner network that includes players like Bajaj General Insurance, Muthoot Fincorp, Shriram Finance and Tata Insurance.

If you‚Äôre looking at finance or insurance for an SMG electric scooter, we can connect you to multiple finance partners for loans/EMI and insurance partners with affordable plans, quick processing and minimal paperwork, plus support for resale value discussions over time.

challenges_startup.label: STARTUP_QUERY
responses: SMG Mobility Challenge is a startup‚Äëfocused initiative that offers seed funding to new‚Äëage entrepreneurs working in areas like green mobility, charging infrastructure and renewable energy.

Through SMG Mobility Challenge, we look for innovative ideas from IITs, NITs, IIMs and other Tier‚Äë1 institutions in green mobility, charging stations and renewable energy.
Teams should not have taken prior funding from other incubators.

If you are from an IIT, NIT, IIM or a Tier‚Äë1 university and are building a solution in green mobility, EV charging or renewables without prior incubator funding, you may be eligible to apply for seed support under the SMG Mobility Challenge.

partnerships.label: COMPANY_INFO
responses:
Our academic partners include:

‚Ä¢ IIT Delhi
‚Ä¢ IIIT Kota
‚Ä¢ Lovely Professional University (LPU)
‚Ä¢ Chandigarh University
‚Ä¢ Rayat Bahra University

SMG Electric Scooters has active academic collaborations with IIT Delhi, IIIT Kota, LPU, Chandigarh University, Rayat Bahra University, CT Group and Gulzar Group for training, projects and youth programmes.

Along with academic partners, SMG has corporate MoUs with organisations such as Skylon Helmets, National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC), ASDC India and Sky Skill Academy to strengthen training and skilling initiatives.

jobs.label: JOB_QUERY
responses:
For careers at SMG Electric Scooters, you can share your resume at hr@smgelectricscootersltd.com or smgelectricscootersltd@gmail.com.
Please mention your name, contact number and the position you are applying for.

We hire for both non‚Äëtechnical and technical roles.

Non‚Äëtechnical roles include: Production & Assembly, HR, Accounting, Logistics, Supply Chain, Marketing, Sales and Purchase, with average salary ranges from about ‚Çπ2.2 LPA to ‚Çπ4.5 LPA.

Technical roles include: Quality, R&D, EV Designing and Software Development, where skills like AutoCAD, SolidWorks, CATIA, MATLAB, NX and MERN stack are valued, with average salary ranges from around ‚Çπ3.6 LPA to ‚Çπ7.5 LPA.

If you‚Äôre interested in working with SMG Electric Scooters:
‚Ä¢ Email your CV to hr@smgelectricscootersltd.com or smgelectricscootersltd@gmail.com
‚Ä¢ Mention your preferred role (technical or non‚Äëtechnical)
‚Ä¢ Non‚Äëtechnical areas: production, HR, accounts, logistics, supply chain, marketing, sales, purchase
‚Ä¢ Technical areas: quality, R&D, EV design, software development
Average packages typically range between ~‚Çπ2.2 LPA and ‚Çπ7.5 LPA depending on role and experience.

dealerships.label: DEALERSHIP_QUERY
responses:
SMG currently has 120+ dealerships across India, including 26 premium dealerships.
By 2028, we plan to expand to 500+ dealerships across India and globally.

If you are interested in becoming an SMG dealer:
‚Ä¢ Eligible entities: MSME, LLP, Private Limited or Public Limited companies
‚Ä¢ Investment typically starts from around ‚Çπ20 lakhs
‚Ä¢ The network already includes 120+ dealerships with expansion underway towards 500+ by 2028.

Our dealership network is growing rapidly, with more than 120 dealers (including premium outlets) already on board, and a roadmap to cross 500 dealerships in India and abroad by 2028.
Investment usually starts from around ‚Çπ20 lakhs and is open to MSME/LLP/Private/Public entities.
